column15: Valentino Pink - Bellies  Best Price Rs 1899.00  EMI Rs 317 for 6 months FREE Shipping in 2 Days
column17:
These pink bellies from Valentino are made of Faux Leather upper and polyurethane sole. They feature a woven and bow design and come in flat soles.

Features
  • Material: Faux Leather
  • Colour: Pink
  • Style: Slip-on
  • Pattern: Closed toe
  • Heel height: Flats
  • Detailing:Woven and bow design

Style it up with your casual outfits for an alluring look

Care Tip
Use a gentle cleaner and then apply a protective gel or conditioner to protect it from the elements.
